website_summaries.verdict: A nice looking rolling cart with attractive oak shelves and a durable metal frame. A great place to display bar glassware.
pros: The cart has two shelves with plenty of room in between to store taller glassware or bottles
It also has wheels to easily move it around
The finished look is industrial chic and works great as a serving or bar cart with room to decorate and store useful items
cons: The wheels can’t be locked in place and the shelves are not made of solid wood

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bar cart! Don't let the price fool you
customer_reviews.text: This was a fabulous find and buy. I had been searching a long time for a contemporary style of bar cart with wheels, and given the prices of everything I had seen I was pretty much resigned to make do without one. Then I saw this, read all the reviews, scrutinized the pictures for quality, and am so glad I purchased! The assembly is a little involved (for me anyway), but I'm lucky I have a great Handyman husband, and it took him ~ 45 min. He got a kick out of the instructions also, which are pretty good (even for me). Pardon the cat, she has to check out anything "new".
customer_reviews.author: Terre

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Y’all I am so obsessed with this bar cart. I always get visitors asking where I got it from and they can never believe I bought it on amazon. The wood is beautiful, it’s easy to assemble and is such a staple for a living room or office. I loveee dressing it up too for the holidays. The best part is that it has wheels so you can bring it anywhere your visitors are sitting and mix them up a drink! I would buy this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Matina

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly + Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this art-it was in expensive, easy to assemble and is as sturdy as it looks. I ended up buying a cheap wine glass rack and attaching it-now it's fully functional for less than other similar carts!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I love love LOVE this bar cart!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble >2 hours total which was about what I expected. The castors (wheels) work great, the shelves have a bar on the bottom of it reinforcing the wood so that it won't bend or buckle with weight added to it (only time will truly tell but I have confidence in it!) For the price this is a really great deal. Honestly it looks like a much more expensive item. Right now stores like Target/Ikea type places have bar carts for $200 or more for crappier ones. I'm going to be loading a photo soon. So with all of that in mind I hope my review helped you in some way! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Great beside an adjustable bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for beside an adjustable bed. The issue of the adjustable bed base is when the head is up the bedside table is left at the wall with nothing in reach. Problem solved! The table is on wheels so it may be pulled out to where you need it. Not too wide, a good height, sturdy, the lower side edge on the top shelf makes accessing items easy without bumping you arm. It is well made materials and was relatively easy to put together. I bought one as a trail basis to see if it worked and now have purchased the second one. Very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Sugee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar cart. It was exactly what I was looking for. I assembled it in a about an hour. It’s very sturdy as well. The instructions state top shelf can hold up to 30lbs and bottom 40lbs. Overall it was a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Cesilia R.

customer_reviews.title: PARTY TIME
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the product that I looked forward to the most. First off, it gives a very fancy and adulting vibe in the living room. Not to mention it gives your kitchen more space for other things. Secondly, I love this as it's very convenient. I usually leave in my living room but let's just say my friends and I need a refill, fret not! I can easily maneuver it over to the kitchen because of the wheels! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice cart!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Make sure if you think you're missing pieces, you turn your box upside and shake it. Out came the rollers. It took aprroximately 30 minutes to assemble. The only direction that was slightly confusing were what to do about screw 9s; they go at the end of the metal rod J. Hope this helps anyone that can't read the small print. Overall sturdy and great cart!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen and Susan

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, pain to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable once it was together, but I had my professional contractor put this together and he said it was the worst and it took him like 30 minutes, which for him is a LONG time. I've seen him put bigger items together in less time. He complained about it quite dramatically. Maybe we just got a bad one, it is a super cool looking thing and very affordable, but I would say get help with assembly if you are a novice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is one of the less expensive carts on Amazon, but HANDS DOWN the best value!! It's very sturdy and the wheels roll smoothly on hardwood floors. It's huge and can store/hold a lot of liquor bottles. I don't like clutter, so we only put up a few bottles on the cart. You could definitely hold up to 50 liquor bottles on this cart. Assembly was extremely easy for my husband. You could assemble it if you've ever put together IKEA furniture. Great piece for storage or decor, either way...I highly recommend buying this bar cart over anything else on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: dimensions are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice sturdy stand - BUT - the dimensions as advertised on Amazon are incorrect - and that makes difference if you need this item for a specific sized space. The advertised dimensions are 32.76L x 17.28W x 36.02H - in reality the dimensions are (and these dimensions are on the box from Sauder) - 30L x 14.5W x 33.5H - some might say oh that's only 2 or 3 inches on each side - but when working in a small space it matters
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A Kapaldo

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is good looking, sturdy, practical, holds a lot of things, and is a great piece of furniture to make your place feel more put together. It was not difficult to assemble, but it did take about 45 minutes to an hour to assemble - keep in mind that I did this myself, and it would probably take closer to 30 minutes with another person. The directions were not confusing and were in a logical order. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart, but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy cart. Came damaged on one of the shelves. Shelves are just made of compressed wood with a thin wood look plastic type looking wood finish. Not bad for the cost. Some screws were hard and/or impossible to put in due to not lining up (screws on braces underneath shelves). Was only able to get one side in on each shelf. Alignment not right. We will see how it lasts. Using it for outdoor grill and shuttling alcohol around
customer_reviews.author: MFowles

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: It’s not hard to put together. Took a little bit but not hard. Instructions are pretty easy to follow. However, some of the pieces were defected. Had to use glue to glue them back on. Like corner pieces was coming detached. After assembly it’s been good. No issue with it so far. It’s cute, looks like what’s in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: katherine yip

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality For the Price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’m actually shocked at the quality for the price! I mean my husband wanted a bar cart but he’s a cheap skate haha and most bar carts that are nice are pretty pricey! I usually shop at PB, West Elm, etc. for furniture and home decor and honestly I could see a high end store selling this for double the cost if not more! It’s light weight but honestly I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really great. It looks very nice especially for the price. It took about 30 min to assemble from the time I unpacked to the final wheels you apply at the end.. I’m actually terrible with putting things together so that says a lot. Super easy to do. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cart with Industrial feel
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing find, so glad I went with this cart. It came quick and was easy to put together. The instructions are clear and actually quite funny. I think it speaks volumes about that company that they take the time to throw some comical one liners into their instructions. The cart itself is sturdy and very industrial. I live in a city loft with exposed white brick and this fits perfectly for my wine and alcohol. Great buy - you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: LO24

customer_reviews.title: The perfect "coffee cart"!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart (after MUCH research) in order to put together a coffee cart for our rental property. It's absolutely perfect! It's very sturdy, rolls smoothly & was super easy to put together. It also holds an ample amount of things including a coffee maker, a tray of coffee cups, and other items needed to make hot drinks. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peachie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material, peeled edges, super thin
customer_reviews.text: Very poor coloring. I bought tgis cart in particular for the coloring of the wood. It is made of MDF material obviously but the edges are are peeled and the Laminate is super thin. I wouldn't recommend this product. Looks super cheap so even after assembling it, I put the extra effort to disassemble it to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Must Have it

customer_reviews.title: Good piece
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cart that could hold a laptop on one shelve and a large monitor on the other. This cart did what I needed and looks good doing it. The color on the shelves is really good and the cart is sturdy. The wheels are a big plus for my needs and very pleased with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: killian

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. I was able to put it together myself in about an hour time. I wasn't rushing and the directions were very easy to follow. Looks great, feels more like real wood than something you would get from Ikea. Great option for the price and fits a lot on it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle vG

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Cart for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this cart. It is great quality for the price. It’s cheaper on Amazon then at target. My only issue with assembly was for one of the braces under the wood shelf, I couldn’t get it to align with some of the holes to put in the additional screws. It is holding just fine without them though. It is bigger than most bar carts I have looked at but it does not overwhelm a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Sand

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: My mom was looking for a plant stand that she could easily move around and this worked perfectly. Took about 30-minutes to put together. Same issues with instructions as with all make-your-self-furniture... tiny pictures you cannot easily read/interpret, but we managed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great super sturdy and great price!
customer_reviews.text: The best bar cart out there. And I’m saying this after using it for about 1.5 years now. The most important thing about it I feel is it’s sturdiness. I used this to move boxes when I moved to my new apartment and now I’m literally doing some woodworking on it! I can’t believe it either and so far, no bents, no dents, no scratches. Nothing! I’m really surprised too. And it’s not really light woodworking, sawed some plywood, hammered nails and everything. And it still looks like it did a year and a half ago. Will be using it as a bar cart once I’m done building. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav Desai

customer_reviews.title: Solid bar cart.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were really good like everybody else said. The product looks great from far away and holds everything I need it to hold. The wood is definitely on the cheaper side and does not look as good as in the person. It is a smooth plastic feeling wood. Kinda like a lot of Ikea items. But then again it's a great price and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Pluda

customer_reviews.title: Cute bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a bar cart to fill this empty space in my living room and this is perfect! Easy to put together but it is definitely cheaply made. Works well for what I needed and I don’t move it around so you can’t really tell it’s not top quality. Wheels are not even but it stays put in one corner so that didn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bar cart ! Simple yet statement worthy.
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful yet simple bar cart. Looks way more expensive than it actually was. I only knocked off one star because the item did come with a few scratches on it. It’s not real wood, so a little damage isn’t worth making a fuss over. Medium difficulty in putting it together. Over all very satisfied and loving my new furniture piece.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to put together! I did it by myself. It took about an hour. All things considered, I would highly recommend this. It’s sturdy, pretty heavy actually and the wood looks and feels real. I suggest assembly on carpet so you don’t scratch anything. Overall really cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Plant shelfie
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, looks good, and is sturdy. It works great as a plant shelf that I can wheel around for easy watering.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Gan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cart, Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this cart and the height is perfect for me. I used the cart as a bar cart and enjoy decorating it for different occasions. I love that it has wheels so that if I wanted to use on the patio, I could just roll it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fakk

customer_reviews.title: After assembly, it's a great cart!
customer_reviews.text: Once we got it assembled, we love this cart. It's sturdy and the sides on the tray are nice to have to ensure things don't slide off. Putting it together was not easy though...
customer_reviews.author: R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: The negative reviews are not true!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!’ Took an hour or so to put together but it’s all worth it for the price, very sturdy, the wheels do not lock but it’s not sliding either so I guess you can’t have it all lol, overall a great product and I am definitely pleased, I was initially discouraged because of some of the negative reviews but DO NOT believe them, it’s very easy to assemble just take your time and follow instructions! Love this
customer_reviews.author: Blair Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good but big!
customer_reviews.text: I might have just not measured correctly but beware this thing is huge! I needed it for my small apartment and while I am going to use it, it is way bigger than it looks. It is very sturdy, but the wheels could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this cart! I use it as extra counter space in the kitchen. Also use to shuttle dinner plates to and from our patio. It is beautiful and sturdy. It rolls easily on its strong casters no matter how heavily I load it. I give it 5 stars gladly!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Cart Considering Price
customer_reviews.text: This is just about as good a bar cart you can get for the price. It looks very nice, it was decently easy to put together, and it is very sturdy and affordable. The wood isn't the best quality (about on par with Ikea - while putting in screws in more than one spot, the edges of the wood raised a little) but for all intents and purposes, this is a bargain and worth the deal. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is an incredible find! I am so pleased with the quality of it, and love the design as much as carts that cost two or three times as much. It is very sturdy, and a nice accent in my kitchen. I had been looking for a bar cart for some time, and I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece of furniture.. easy to put together,  and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made this year. Very sturdy, beautiful and easy to put together. The instructions were clear and very easy to make sense of. It came nicely packaged to make sure it wasn't damaged. Win win
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Riley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have such a small kitchen and needed something to put things on so i could free up some space and this was absolutely perfect! I ordered another item by this company and had the same experience as this. Definitely buy if you are considering it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to Assemble and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over the internet for a good drink cart like this. I put this in our showroom to host coffee and treats. It does the job and looks nice. I saw a lot of reviews mentioning how hard the assembly was and I didn't feel like it was anything crazy. Definitely think just about anyone could figure it out. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this piece is phenomenal, especially for the price. I hate putting furniture together with a passion, but to my surprise this was very simple. I searched high and low for a bar cart that fit my budget and was also of good quality. This one definitely fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: kristin4290

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: I actually put this together myself correctly the first time. The instructions could not be easier and I feel that it's a solid piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This cart took less than 30 minutes to assemble. Its simple modern appearance and solid construction is just what I was looking for. I can use it as a bar cart or use it to serve appetizers or dessert.
customer_reviews.author: MHT

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my bar cart. I left a review but they didnt post due to wrong item being sent to me. Bar cart is nice tho in pics.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect bar cart
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect bar cart for over a year, I’m glad I found this item on amazon. Easy to set up, its a good size for what we wanted it for, it feels sturdy and looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to assemble !
customer_reviews.text: Minus two stars for the length of time to put together , took a over hour for a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my hands to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult to assemble and it hurt my hand to try to screw the parts in. Overall, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P Gloriani

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a barcart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a housewarming gift, it looks exactly as pictured. Assembly wasn’t bad, took 20 mins. It seems like a lot of little parts when you open the package but went together with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Inexpensive Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart but I think I love the price even more! Bar carts are super expensive and this was one of very few under $100 for the size. Assembly was easy because the directions and labels were awesome! My only complaint, and reason why I gave 4 stars and not 5, is that in one area the 'wood' was peeling before I even started assembling it. It is minor but still annoying. I do not regret this purchase and neither will you! :) I'm attaching a photo. Please excuse the untrimmed walls and the lack of switch plate as we are in the process of updating things!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Classic looking, easy to put together and looks like it’s more expensive than it was. Came very quickly and I was able to put it together by myself fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Sauder Bar Cart
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar cart! It was insanely easy to assemble and the instructions were actually pretty encouraging and funny. A delightful surprise. This Bar cart is made very well and is also quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Peasncarrots

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Is so cute, very well made, sturdy and very handy, I usually have it inside my kitchen but if I have people in my deck I use it for drinks 🍹 🍷 glasses, napkins and totally extra decorative item. I looked everywhere and other websites offered way way more expensive for same type of cart. Loved this purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love this. We use it as a coffee cart ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this. We use it as a coffee cart in our kitchen/family room. It's easy to move around and has quite a bit of space. We have a coffee maker, grinder, and espresso machine all on top.
customer_reviews.author: Joel F

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a coffee cart but it can be used for anything really, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put next to the water cooler to house some cups and also dog treat jars and such. Very nice and sturdy and wheels glide smoothly. Looks much nicer than I expected atthis price point.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a house so I’m starting to buy some small furniture items to fill it up. I bought this bar cart as the dimensions fit along a wall in my dining room. I assembled it myself and was easy to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyse Ann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and it’s tall. Putting this together was a huge hassle ..
customer_reviews.author: saras

customer_reviews.title: (Didn't check the dimensions but I am happy it is larger
customer_reviews.text: Product was larger than I thought! (Didn't check the dimensions but I am happy it is larger!) My boyfriend said it took him about 40 minutes, probably would have taken me 3 hours with my attention span so good thing I was at work when it arrived. It is sturdy and for the price looks great! I would have bought something similar at a store for probably twice the price. Pretty stoked for my new tea/drink cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Ethy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love the cart! It matches the coffee table we have in the family room. With a few accessories this does the same work that those costing much more. It does take some time to put together but it's pretty easy, the instructions are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzbrik

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is adequate for my purposes, and fairly sturdy. Not the best directions.
customer_reviews.author: Holly McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar cart. It's very sturdy and made out of heavy wood not flimsy at all. The picture doesnt do it justice. Nice addition to the room. It accomplished exactly what I intended to do with the space which was liven it up with the addition of the bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: Myjoi247

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Easy to assemble, and it looks great a bar cart. Sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett S.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would fit this space and this little cart is perfect. It was easy to assemble and is heavy/sturdy. Perfect for a coffee or alcohol bar.
customer_reviews.author: BrittW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little cart for sure. Assembly was fairly easy, and the price is good. I was hoping that the faux wood would look more realistic, and after putting it together I realised that I don't love it, but was to lazy to disassemble and return it. So, its staying put.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy and stylish cart!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly. Not quick, but easy. End result is fabulous, stylish cart for rolling bar or whatever. Nice working height.
customer_reviews.author: carol barr

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I put this bar cart out in covered patio. It’s ready to be used anytime. Looks so modern. Good design. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: supermama

customer_reviews.title: Great bar cart
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is a great find. It was easy to assemble, took minutes. It’s a very good size, and looks more expensive than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for budget conscious people
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic cart. It's durable, looks nice, was easy to assemble, and is a good size. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made from China and looked horrible in person. Scratch marks ingrained in the wood. My expectation is where is the quality control from the people who sell this.
customer_reviews.author: sterlinghawk

customer_reviews.title: Great price: easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great find. For the price point, it’s amazing. I assembled it by myself in about an hour with a screw driver. Looks good and is pretty sturdy! Definitely recommend if you want a good looking bar cart but don’t want to spend a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: carey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I wanted for my home. I put my orchids on top of it and move it to where the direction of the sunlight shines in my dining room. It’s also great for entertaining guests (drinks, desserts, and extra dishes).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and does not look cheap for the price. I LOVE this piece and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to create a Hot Cocoa Bar this past Winter and it's been holding up great! It's very durable and the color is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: TDW

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together, defective parts and screws.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with defective hardware and wooden pieces. The screws/hardware did not fit into the wooden pieces and it was difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: vp10

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Bar Cart
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is a perfect size and fits great on my deck. I’m very happy with this bar cart and great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bar cart for the money
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for this product are by far the most impressive thing about it. It took only about an hour and a half to put it together, and I was estimating it would be three or more. The quality of the materials itself are great for the price, and it seems to beat out virtually every other bar cart on Amazon at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Mouton

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar cart for the value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many different bar carts while shopping and this was by far the best one for the price I came across. It was pretty easy to put together and is large in size. The shelving material isn't the highest quality to the touch but it still looks very nice. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This went together easily and feels pretty sturdy! Love it so far for our small apartment and creates a nice focal point in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ciccarello

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bar cart
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is amazing! Easy to assemble, sturdy and looks great. I combed through the internet and went to tons of stores to try and find a bar car that was affordable and good quality, and this one definitely met my expectations. This one surpasses many of the $150 to $200+ bar carts I saw in stores!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This cart looks great and is holding up well. I do wish it had locking wheels though.
customer_reviews.author: Hands Full

customer_reviews.title: Love it perfect for a small bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is the perfect size I placed it on an angle in the corner of my dinning room. It looks expensive the quality and a good.
customer_reviews.author: Nordia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Searched in stores and online for a long time for a bar cart. Was weary of this items sturdiness when I ordered it. However, it’s amazing. Very sturdy, great quality. I’ve gotten many compliments on this item. Definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: fe

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my screened in porch. Perfect for holding needed items especially when entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: jagjean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy. Well packaged. Looks modern. I use as a plant stand. Wheels work pretty well on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bar cart! Exactly as pictured and very easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy love the clean lines and modern look.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar cart! Very sturdy love the clean lines and modern look. Used it for a Mamosa bar at my sisters baby shower and got so many compliments! Plan to use it out by our pool this summer. Great bar cart at a good price .
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H

customer_reviews.title: and super functional. It's the perfect size to make a ...
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is exactly what I wanted. It's modern, sleek, and super functional. It's the perfect size to make a little coffee bar on the top tier and place my barware below. I attached a wine glass rack to the bottom of the top shelf and it's perfectly functional and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Paid for new, but got used.
customer_reviews.text: Received item in what looked like it had been re-packaged. Started putting it together and that is when I noticed the screws and dowlrods missing that are needed. Maybe it’s a good item but his company should not send re-packaged items out and charge new price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Truly excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for a studio. Love the levels and space. It fits my home well and the few guests I've allowed inside have given it many compliments! Took me about 45 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sahina Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly beautiful and easy to assemble. It’s a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together, really great looking! Sturdy as well, we were able to put our microwave on it without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great though. A bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Too difficult to put together. I did it with a power drill and 1 hour later. It looks great though. A bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: RET1984

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, and decent quality, especially for the price. My husband put it together with no issues in about 45 minutes. No buyer's remorse here!
customer_reviews.author: IndyTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was worried it would be really flimsy or cheap looking but it came out so amazing! It was easy to put together and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It took time to put this together and kinda need extra hands at one point. But following directions and having the right tools made it really move along.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fedele

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It looks like I spent $300 on this cart. Great value for the low price
customer_reviews.author: drsuzwilson

customer_reviews.title: Handsome cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is gorgeous! Looks smart, clean and handsome! If you are in need of a nice accent to add to your decor this is the cart for you! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy good piece
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall end result of this piece. It was a little harder to build but turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: honey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product was well worth it! I wanted a bar cart to put in my dining room but didn't want to pay too much. This purchase was awesome and exceeded my expectation. I get so many compliments on it when guests come over! It's overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good looking modern bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Matches my whole Sauder collection of tables and sofa table and bookshelf...love this clean look!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Matches the target vintage oak furniture from target perfectly! Great quality and perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Hattie Salamy

product_meta.title: Sauder North Avenue Cart, Charter Oak finish
product_meta.description: Color:Charter OakKeep the fun and entertainment rolling through your home with this cart from the North Avenue collection. This clean-cut cart features two spacious shelves for drinks, glasses, and your favorite appetizer. It's easy-roll casters allow it to move from room to room so the party is never limited to one space. Constructed with a durable, black metal frame and finished on all surfaces in Charter Oak, this versatile cart is sure to be a crowd pleaser in any room.
feature_bullets: Finished on all sides for versatile placement
